Review_title: This really is a great story and tells the true meaning behind movie trailers people who don't like movie trailers need to watch this movie to understand the real magic
Review_Text: I definitely think this is an amazing well put together movie and tell the true potential of trailers and how they came to be there are a few cuts that seem very bizarre in this movie I like the way they put different YouTuber reactions into the trailer and the movie if you think about it it seems very bizarre that they had a trailer for this movie but all amazing movies have to I don't understand well I do but I think that it shouldn't be done why people don't like watching training sometimes it does spoil the movie but it's the entertainment that counts overall I give this a 74%

Review_title: An excellent documentary that will stand the test of time
Review_Text: A very insightful, heartfelt and polished look into a widely utilised and shared (but often not properly understood) medium and related set of experiences that are brilliantly discussed, dissected and ultimately summarised in this documentary. An excellent documentary film that will definitely stand the test of time.
